name: World Cup
overview: World Cup is a management strategy game, where you select your squad; try to qualify and then win the World Cup. Up against 39 other international teams, it's not going to be easy. You have to watch your opposition, pick your friendlies carefully, hope you don't get too many injuries. Bring on your youngsters steadily, to fit your team. If a draw takes place during the knockout section of the World Cup, the game will go to penalties.
